Text: REQUEST ISDA Notice and Amendment Cc Please find attached our form of notice and amendment to the ISDA agreement between MEGA and Enron North America as successor to Enron Capital Trade Resources Let me know if you have any changes and we will forward executed copies along with copies of the Merger Certificates THX Sterling PS Our credit person is Maureen Piercey See attached file MEGA merger notice Enron NAdocSee attached file Enron NA AMENDMENT schedule blkdoc MEGA merger notice Enron NAdoc Enron NA AMENDMENT schedule blkdoc
